functions.name: CountDecimalDigits
functions.logic: Calculates the number of decimal digits in a given 32-bit unsigned integer. It iteratively divides the input value by 10 until it's less than 10, incrementing a counter in each iteration.

functions.name: operator<<
functions.logic: Overloads the output stream operator to print a specified number of spaces to the output stream. It iterates 'padding.spaces' times and prints a space character in each iteration. It also includes a guard to prevent excessively large padding values (greater than 10000 spaces) from being printed, which could cause performance issues.
